name: Death Sentence VR
description:
After a long night of programming and drinking with friends, you wake up to find yourself in a nightmare. Not only are you back at school, but there are monsters roaming the halls that restart your dream if they catch you! Search the building for the portal that lets you out... or find some way to defend yourself.

Requirements:

Oculus Rift

Controls:

Left stick [Movement]

Right stick [Adjust View]

Triggers [Use Abilities (Once books are collected)]

Start Menu: 

To show pointer click on right thumb-stick and right index-trigger to confirm choice
